name: Great Tree
description: An incredible tree towers over the landscape. It's entirely dark under the umbrage of the branches far above. A path continues away from the tree, though it looks unused. Curiously, there is a small glow coming from one of the highest visible branches.

name: Overgrown Trail
description: The path leads into the woods until reaching a very tall tree. While nothing in comparison to the Great Tree that towers above you, it would otherwise be considered very big. The trail splits into a northern and southern route.

name: Magician's Camp
description: The camp here looks recently used, but no one is around. The tents are unfamiliar in design and there are strange instruments sitting out in front of a campfire that appears to be burning from nothing. There is a path that leads away from the Great Tree.

name: Sanbon Clearing
description: The trees give way to a small plain here. You can still see the Great Tree in the distance. The field is full of flowers and there are a number of spots to collect honey from the bees that pollinate them. To the east you can see the ocean coast fading into the skyline. There's a rugged path that seems to lead down toward the shore. It appears a giant stone has been placed in the way. You'll need to find a way around.
